xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: templates:apply
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: templates:apply($content+ as node(), $resolver as function, $model? as map, $configuration? as map) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description:
Start processing the provided content. Template functions are looked up by calling the provided function $resolver. The function should take a name as a string and return the corresponding function item. The simplest implementation of this function could look like this: 
function($functionName as xs:string, $arity as xs:int) { function-lookup(xs:QName($functionName), $arity) }
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $content+ the sequence of nodes which will be processed
$resolver a function which takes a name and returns a function with that name
$model? a sequence of items which will be passed to all called template functions. Use this to pass information between templating instructions.
